content: I see stinkprogress continues to race with brightfart to the bottom. Spicer was not denying the holocaust. Don’t be stupid, Zack Ford. He was talking about weapons used in combat. That’s why he used the word “weapon”. He never said the Nazi’s didn’t use gas chambers. He’s a poor spokesman, NOT an holocaust denier. Zack Ford, on the other hand is a liar and hate monger.
